name: UIBandSelectionInteraction.State
desc: Constants that indicate whether a band selection interaction object is inactive or currently tracking an interaction.

items.name: case possible
items.desc: A state that indicates the interaction object is ready to start a new interaction.

items.name: case began
items.desc: A state that indicates the interaction object began a new interaction.

items.name: case selecting
items.desc: A state that indicates the interaction object is tracking changes to the selection rectangle.

items.name: case ended
items.desc: A state that indicates the current interaction ended.
